docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.30.4 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.4 --platform=linux/<ARCH> --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .

docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.28.13 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.13 --platform=linux/<ARCH> --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
